00013     template <typename t1>
00014     class signal1 : public signal_base
00015     {
00016     private:
00017         typedef std::list<connection1_base<t1>*> slotlist;
00018         typedef std::list<void (*)(t1)> funclist;
00019 
00020         slotlist _slotlist;
00021         funclist _funclist;
00022 
00023     public:
00024         ~signal1() {
00025             disconnectall();

00034         void connect(object_type* obj, void (object_type::*memfunc)(t1));

00036         inline void connect(void (*func)(t1)) {
00037             _funclist.push_back(func);
00038         }

00040     //=============================================================================================================
00041     template <typename t1>
00042     void signal1<t1>::operator ()(t1 p1)
00043     {
00044         slotlist::iterator it = _slotlist.begin();
00045         slotlist::iterator end = _slotlist.end();
00046         slotlist::iterator next;
00047 
00048         while( it != end )
00049         {
00050             next = it;
00051             ++next;
00052 
00053             (*it)->emit(p1);
00054             it = next;
00055         }
00056 
00057         funclist::iterator fit = _funclist.begin();
00058         funclist::iterator fend = _funclist.end();
00059         funclist::iterator fnext = _funclist.end();
00060 
00061         while( fit != fend )
00062         {
00063             fnext = fit;
00064             ++fnext;
00065 
00066             (*fit)(p1);
00067             fit = fnext;
00068         }
00069     }

00071     template <typename t1>
00072     template <typename object_type>
00073     void signal1<t1>::connect(object_type* obj, void (object_type::*memfunc)(t1))
00074     {
00075         connection1<object_type, t1>* conn = new connection1<object_type, t1>(obj, memfunc);
00076         _slotlist.push_back(conn);
00077 
00078         obj->signalconnect(this);
00079     }

00081     template <typename t1>
00082     void signal1<t1>::disconnect(has_slots* obj)
00083     {
00084         slotlist::iterator it = _slotlist.begin();
00085         slotlist::iterator end = _slotlist.end();
00086         slotlist::iterator next;
00087 
00088         while( it != end )
00089         {
00090             next = it;
00091             ++next;
00092 
00093             if( (*it)->getobj() == obj )
00094             {
00095                 (*it)->getobj()->signaldisconnect(this);
00096                 delete (*it);
00097 
00098                 _slotlist.erase(it);
00099             }
00100 
00101             it = next;
00102         }
00103     }
00104     //=============================================================================================================
00105     template <typename t1>
00106     void signal1<t1>::disconnect(void (*func)(t1))
00107     {
00108         // TODO: és ha többször van benne?
00109 
00110         funclist::iterator it = _funclist.begin();
00111         funclist::iterator end = _funclist.end();
00112 
00113         for( ; it != end; ++it )
00114         {
00115             if( (*it) == func )
00116             {
00117                 _funclist.erase(it);
00118                 return;
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }

00127         slotlist::iterator end = _slotlist.end();

00132             delete (*it);
00133         }
00134
